item.description:
Here is a midweek opportunity for you and your dog to stretch your legs after work.   Northfield Mountain has miles of trails to explore, and many options in terms of distance, terrain, and interesting things to see.  My thinking is to make a loop over Rose Ledge, returning on the Summit and West Slope trails which should take 1.5 hours or so, but we can certainly make alternative plans.

FMI about the trails:

http://www.firstlightpower.com/northfield/brochures/Trail_map.pdf

Directions:  Northfield Mountain is located on Rt 63, Northfield, 2 miles north of Rt 2.  The turn is well marked, and the visitor's center is visible from Rt 63.  Let's meet at the visitor center parking area at 6:00.

If there is interest, maybe this walk can be repeated on a weekly/ biweekly basis?

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Midweek after-work walk at Northfield Mountain
